name: No More Cuteness
description:
In our gamejam we randomly got given one verb and one noun which was to be our theme. We had gotten "Build" and "Anger".  The game is situated in an adorable world with someone who hates every bit of it. Eventually he goes on a rampage and decides to kill everyone. Every kill boosts his endless rampage. Don't let him calm down. 

Use of Headphones HIGHLY recommended!!!!!!!

WASD to move, mouse to point and click to shoot.
